channel.title: Summoning emote help
channel.description: So I have this source and if has near fully working summoning with one defect that is rather depressing... No skillcape emote. I have the skillcape, and hood, but when I click operate on the skill cape it says that I am not wearing a skill cape. It displays the same message when I click the skill cape emote under the emotes tab. Any ideas? The same issue is for hunter and construction.

item.title: Summoning emote help
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

They are not defined as a Skillcape.

This is what you should do -

12169 = Summoning Skillcape

Open Shopassistant.java and find

And add the Cape ID ’ 12169’ to the current ints.

That should give you a good idea on how to add emote for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Summoning emote help
item.dc:creator: @cam_man98 cam man98
item.description:

So I have this source and if has near fully working summoning with one defect that is rather depressing… No skillcape emote.
